column1: Ageing and Social Change, Master's Programme
column5: Do you want to contribute to the sustainability of an ageing society and the well-being of an ageing population? Then this is your master’s programme.
column7: SEK 177600 SEK (approx.16,500 USD/ 15,300 Euro) NB: Applies only to students from outside the EU, EEA and Switzerland.
column9: The programme is offered as a one‑year option, 60 credits, or a two-year option, 120 credits.
